name: Platformer (Nythen)
description:
Hello!

This minigame was started as an exercice from the Master on Videogames Programming and Virtual Reality of TokioSchool.

The game is programmed in C# and Unity. 

Let me know your thoughts ^^

Controls

AD /  Left Joystick -> Move

Space / South button -> Jump

E / East button -> Interact (Doors and chests)

WARNING
The controller isn't working properly with the menus, I'm working on it.
